title: An Unnoticed Yet Crucial Change with the Lore Change
body:
Urf, the Manatee Prince, is no longer possibly dead. His lore revolved around him being inspired by Jax to join the League of Legends, but then getting killed by Warwick in his first League match. Now that there is no League, Urf could still be alive and present unless Riot finds another way to kill him, which would be cruel.

Just sharing what I found.

replies.body: That is... actually a rather good point. Alright, one could alter it slightly, make it so Urf wanted to become a warrior like Jax (rather than a champion) but that'd be a dickish move to outright kill off Urf yet again.
Urf the manatee becomes a fish seller.. he was robbed by ww.. nerf irilia.. end story
he said a sister named fru

So now the true reason comes out, the next champion is urf and riot couldnt figure out how to bring urf back to life, so they realized if they just removed the whole lore in general then urf wouldnt be dead!

Urf confirmed next champion, and this is why they couldnt come out with the ultimate skin in 2014, because the ultimate skin is urfs

Might be a joke or it might not  be one

I would actually be down to play as a big Manatee. The only issue I see with this is that he's already directly shown in several skins.
